Name: constrain_team_size_upper
Description: The team size must not exceed the recommended maximum of 9 members.

Name: constrain_team_size_lower
Description: The team size must meet the recommended minimum of 3 members.

Name: require_active_team_status
Description: A worker can only be assigned to a team with an 'active' status.

Name: require_minimum_skill_level
Description: A worker must have a minimum skill level to be assigned to certain tasks.

Name: constrain_sprint_effort_by_velocity
Description: The total effort of user stories in a sprint backlog should not exceed the team's average velocity.

Name: ensure_project_is_active
Description: Features can only be planned for a project that has an 'active' status.

Name: task_must_be_done_for_story
Description: For a user story to be considered 'done'
IsSum: all its associated tasks must also be 'done'.

Name: constrain_project_by_budget
Description: The total cost incurred by the project must not exceed its allocated budget.

Name: require_feature_priority
Description: Every feature in the product backlog must have a defined priority.

Name: sprint_goal_must_be_defined
Description: Every sprint must be associated with a clearly defined sprint goal.

Name: worker_must_be_available
Description: A worker must have an 'available' status to be assigned to new tasks.

Name: epic_must_be_in_backlog
Description: An epic must belong to a product backlog to be considered for development.
